text: Gustavo Martin Emilio Hamer (born 24 June 1997) is a Dutch-Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for EFL Championship club Coventry City. ==Club career== Hamer made his official debut in the Eredivisie match against Ajax on 2 April 2017 replacing Bart Nieuwkoop in 89th minute of De Klassieker in Amsterdam (1–2). On 3 July 2020, Hamer signed for English club Coventry City for a fee exceeding £1m. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Feyenoord |2016–17 |Eredivisie |2||0||0||0||colspan="4"|—||2||0 |- |Dordrecht (loan) |2017–18 |Eerste Divisie |34||3||1||0||colspan="2"|—||4Appearances in the 2017–18 Eerste Divisie play- offs||0||39||3 |- |rowspan="3"|PEC Zwolle |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Eredivisie |23||0||1||0||colspan="4"|—||24||0 |- |2019–20 |25||4||1||0||colspan="4"|—||26||4 |- !colspan=2|Total !48!!4!!2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!50!!4 |- |Coventry City |2020–21 |Championship |4||0||0||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||5||0 |- !colspan=3|Career totals !88!!7!!3!!0!!1!!0!!4!!0!!96!!7 |} ==International career== Hamer was born in Brazil, but adopted and raised in the Netherlands. He is a youth international for the Netherlands at the U20 level. ==Honours== Feyenoord * Eredivisie: 2016–17 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch footballers Category:Netherlands youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Dutch people of Brazilian descent Category:Dutch adoptees Category:Eredivisie players Category:Coventry City F.C. players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Feyenoord players Category:FC Dordrecht players Category:PEC Zwolle players Category:English Football League players
